section.title: Setting up the NEFS Sampler Application on Your Own App Server
section.para: You may download the NEFS Sampler application as app-server-independent .war file. The Sampler Application's .war file includes all of the NEF binary files, resources and everything you need to use NEF. Once you have downloaded the .war file, you have everything you need to start modifying and adding to the app.

section.title: Downloading the Sampler Application
section.para: You can download the NEF Sampler Application file from http://www.netspective.com/corp/downloads/frameworks/samples

section.title: Setting up the Sampler Application
section.para: Copy the downloaded nefs-sampler.war file to the webapps folder of your servlet container (application server) and run (or restart) the application server. This will create an Application Directory Structure containing the necessary NEF files and sub-folders, under the webapps folder of your application server.

section.title: Testing the Sampler Application in a Browser
section.para: Use a web browser to access the root of the Sampler Application using the URL of the form http://host:port/nefs-sampler. If everything worked as it should, you will see the Sampler Application Welcome Page.
